structure.unit: ARTICLE II. METROPOLITAN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY MINIMUM HOUSING STANDARDS

text.section:
Sec. 17-30.1. Exceptions.
The provisions of this article shall not be applicable to migrant labor camps, as defined by Section 381.422, Florida Statutes, or to tourist or trailer camps, as defined by Section 513.01, Florida Statutes, which hold valid, current licenses issued by the Florida State Board of Health. The provisions of this article shall not be applicable to temporary housing, as defined in(24) of this article, or to temporary housing utilized for dwelling purposes in times of local emergency, disaster, or urgent necessity, as determined by the Hearing Officer. The provisions of this article shall be applicable to all other dwellings, housing and buildings used or intended for use for human habitation.
